attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
For many Teabags around the world, their early years are far from the safe, supportive environment they require to give them the best possible start in life. As well as the threats from hot water, sugar, milk and the horrible wars of the ripping open of the tetley boxes, Teabags face commercial exploitation by humans who deny them their fundamental rights to protection...

This is the worst kind of cruelty, an act of vampirism, we pour boiling hot water all over these poor bags, then strain them to get their blood out. This is a sad new, modern world...

Drink Coffee instead.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
